# General Plugin Info do not edit
base   openbadge
author Martyn Eggleton
email  martyn@access-space.org
date   2012-06-02
name   Open Badges Plugin
desc   Collect earnt OBI compliant OpenBadges and transfer them to a users Backpack. (Eventually will allow earinng too)
url    http://www.dokuwiki.org/plugin:openbadge
